thread.title: A few of Deepika’s favourite things | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: A few of Deepika’s favourite things | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: A few of Deepika’s favourite things | Deccan Chronicle
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Natasha Coutinho | October 20, 2015, 23.09 pm Deepika Singh In a rapid fire with Deepika Singh aka Sandhya from Diya Aur Baati Hum, we get a glimpse of the person off screen.
Nickname: I don’t have a nickname but yes, my family and relatives call me Supriya. This name was given to me by my daadi.
Favourite hangouts in Mumbai : Pizza By The Bay at Nariman Point.
Who are you closest to? My husband Rohit.
Favourite spot on the sets and why? The place where I perform my scenes, that spot becomes my favourite.
Favourite sweet dish: I love sweets and kheer is my favourite.
Ice-cream or chocolates?
Chocolates.
Hills stations or beaches? That would depend on the weather. So I’d prefer beaches in the winters and hills during summers.
Ultimate dream: My dream is to become the most popular and highest paid artiste.
Best compliment received: My audience never feels like Sandhya is not a real woman. They don’t feel she is a fictitious character
